SELECT P.recid AS ID, P.probe_type, P.customer_id AS ORG_ID, C.group_name AS COMMAND_GROUP_NAME, C.name AS COMMAND_NAME, P.notify_critical, P.notify_warning, P.notify_unknown, P.notify_recovery, P.notification_interval_minutes, P.check_interval_minutes, P.retry_interval_minutes, P.max_attempts, P.last_update_date, P.description, PS.state AS PROBE_STATE, PS.output FROM rhn_sat_cluster SC, rhn_command C, rhn_check_probe CP, rhn_probe P LEFT JOIN rhn_probe_state PS ON PS.probe_id = P.recid WHERE CP.host_id = :sid AND CP.probe_id = P.recid AND CP.sat_cluster_id = SC.recid AND P.command_id = C.recid ORDER BY UPPER(PS.state)
SELECT GROUP_NAME AS COMMAND_GROUP_NAME, DESCRIPTION AS COMMAND_GROUP_LABEL FROM rhn_command_groups ORDER BY UPPER(GROUP_NAME)
SELECT command_id, param_name, param_type, data_type_name, description, mandatory, default_value, min_value, max_value, field_order, field_widget_name, field_visible_length, field_maximum_length, field_visible, default_value_visible FROM rhn_command_parameter WHERE command_id = :command_id ORDER BY PARAM_TYPE, FIELD_ORDER
SELECT SC.recid AS SAT_CLUSTER_ID, SC.customer_id, SC.description, SC.public_key, SC.vip, SC.pem_public_key, SC.pem_public_key_hash, SN.recid AS SAT_NODE_ID, SN.mac_address, SN.max_concurrent_checks, SN.ip, SN.sched_log_level, SN.sput_log_level, SN.dq_log_level FROM rhn_sat_cluster SC, rhn_sat_node SN WHERE SC.customer_id = :customer_id AND SN.sat_cluster_id = SC.recid ORDER BY UPPER(SC.description)
SELECT PPV.value, CP.param_name FROM rhn_probe_param_value PPV, rhn_command_parameter CP WHERE PPV.probe_id = :probe_id AND CP.command_id = :command_id AND PPV.param_name = CP.param_name AND CP.field_visible = 1
SELECT CSS.state, CSS.state_count FROM rhn_current_state_summaries CSS WHERE CSS.customer_id = :org_id AND CSS.template_id = 'svc_probe' ORDER BY UPPER(state)
SELECT count(*) as STATE_COUNT FROM rhn_probe_state PS, rhn_check_probe CP, rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE PS.state = :state AND PS.probe_id = CP.probe_id AND CP.host_id = USP.server_id AND USP.user_id = :user_id
SELECT probe_id, scout_id, state, output, TO_CHAR(last_check, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_CHECK FROM rhn_probe_state WHERE probe_id = :probe_id
SELECT m.metric_id, m.storage_unit_id, m.description, m.label FROM rhn_probe p, rhn_metrics m, rhn_command c WHERE p.recid = :probe_id AND p.command_id = c.recid AND c.command_class = m.command_class ORDER BY m.metric_id

SELECT probe_type, description, customer_id, command_id, contact_group_id, notify_critical, notify_warning, notify_unknown, notify_recovery, notification_interval_minutes, check_interval_minutes, retry_interval_minutes, max_attempts, last_update_user, last_update_date FROM rhn_probe WHERE recid = :probe_id
SELECT CP.host_id system_id, P.recid probe_id, P.description probe_description, S.name AS SYSTEM_NAME FROM rhnServer S, rhn_check_probe CP, rhn_probe P, rhn_contact_group_members CGM WHERE CP.probe_id = P.recid AND P.contact_group_id = CGM.contact_group_id AND CGM.member_contact_method_id = :method_id AND S.id = CP.host_id ORDER BY S.name, S.id, P.description, P.recid
SELECT macro.name, macro.definition, macro.environment, macro.description, macro.last_update_user, TO_CHAR(macro.last_update_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_update_date FROM config_macro macro WHERE macro.editable = 1
SELECT S.id system_id, S.name system_name, P.recid probe_id, P.description probe_description, PS.state probe_state, PS.output probe_output, TO_CHAR(PS.last_check, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_CHECK FROM rhnServer S, rhn_probe P, rhn_probe_state PS, rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE P.recid = PS.probe_id AND S.id = (SELECT host_id from check_probe where probe_id = P.recid) AND customer_id = :org_id AND P.probe_type = 'check' AND PS.state = 'OK' AND USP.user_id = :user_id AND USP.server_id = S.id ORDER BY system_name, probe_description
